backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend for the ICP canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five high-confidence features related to the two-video journey flow, campfire destination screen, and state machine updates with associated test IDs and file references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend component files describing the RV journey flow, UI components, hooks, and scene definitions for the two-video interactive experience.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, defining the warm desert/road-trip color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with title describing an interactive RV driver-view website with 3 checkpoints and action choices.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the RVExperience component within a full-height container.
frontend/src/components/rv/ActionPlaybac: Empty file placeholder for action playback component (content truncated or not yet implemented).
frontend/src/components/rv/AnimatedTrave: Empty file placeholder for animated travel fallback component (content truncated or not yet implemented).
frontend/src/components/rv/BreakStopReac: Modal overlay component that displays when reaching a break stop, featuring an animated RV icon, sound effects, and a continue button.
frontend/src/components/rv/CampfireEndSc: Final destination celebration screen displaying the campfire background image, RV badge earned message, and continue button with sound effects.
frontend/src/components/rv/CheckpointOve: Empty file placeholder for checkpoint overlay component (content truncated or not yet implemented).
frontend/src/components/rv/checkpoints.t: Defines checkpoint data structures (ActionItem, CheckpointData) and exports three checkpoints (Rest Stop, Scenic Overlook, Campground) with various water-consuming actions and their consumption values.
frontend/src/components/rv/ClickToContin: Empty file placeholder for click-to-continue hint component (content truncated or not yet implemented).
frontend/src/components/rv/JourneyHaltIs: Interactive quiz overlay presenting five answer options (fuel, food, tire, water, battery) with visual feedback, sound effects, and correct answer validation for the water tank issue.
frontend/src/components/rv/ProgressIndic: Top-bar progress indicator showing journey status with progress bar and percentage, mapping flow states to progress values from 0% (start) to 100% (complete).
frontend/src/components/rv/RVBadgeCelebr: Displays a celebration overlay when the user earns an RV badge, featuring animations, sound effects, and a button to proceed to the destination.
Main orchestrator component for the RV journey experience that manages flow state, renders different scenes (start, travel videos, rest points, issues, completion), and handles background audio and scene transitions.
frontend/src/components/rv/scenes.ts: Defines SceneData interface and exports five scene configurations for the RV journey: two video scenes (morning and continuing journey), and three static image scenes (halt issue, night road, campfire destination).
frontend/src/components/rv/StartJourneyS: Initial screen that introduces the RV journey adventure with overview details, instructions, and a start button that triggers sound effects.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelScene.t: Renders a static travel scene with a background image, title, description, and optional click interactivity with hint text.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelTransit: Displays a loading transition screen between journey segments with animated spinner, checkpoint messaging, and sound effects.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelVideoSc: Renders a travel scene with video background that falls back to static image on error, supporting click interactivity and optional darkening overlay.
Final completion screen showing journey summary, badge earned status, restart button, and footer with attribution link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useRVFlow.ts: Custom hook managing RV journey flow state machine with eight states (start, traveling videos, rest point, halt issue, night road, destination, complete) and transition functions between them.
frontend/src/hooks/useSfx.ts: React hook for managing sound effects with HTMLAudioElement, providing play/stop controls, loading state tracking, error handling, and configurable volume/loop options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom warm desert/road-trip color palette using OKLCH color space, defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and utility classes for text shadows.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, rendering the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending default theme with custom OKLCH-based color system, container settings, border radius variables, warm-themed shadows, and custom animations for accordions, fades, and slides.
project_state.json: Project state tracking an interactive RV journey app with two-video structure, rest points, issue resolution, night road sequence, and campfire celebration ending. Contains existing features and pending feature requests for flow restructuring.
